repeating.value: select user_name, time_stamp, string_3, string_4, object_name from dm_audittrail where audited_obj_id= '$value(r_object_id)' and event_name = 'c2_controled_print' order by time_stamp desc ENABLE(FETCH_ALL_RESULTS 1)
select effective_date from cd_controlled_doc where r_object_id ='$value(r_object_id)'
